summary: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.
cast: Ben Stiller|Chris Rock|David Schwimmer|Jada Pinkett Smith|Sacha Baron Cohen|Cedric the Entertainer|Andy Richter|Tom McGrath|Christopher Knights|Chris Miller|Conrad Vernon|Eric Darnell|David Cowgill|Stephen Apostolina|Elisa Gabrielli|Devika Parikh|David P. Smith|Cody Cameron|Bob Saget|John DiMaggio|Jan Josef Liefers|Bastian Pastewka|Drazen Bratulic|Zrinka Cvitesic|Zeljko Duvnjak|Zoran Gogic|Ozren Grabaric|Jeffrey Katzenberg|Boris Mirkovic|Ranko Tihomirovic|Marko Torjanac|Drago Utjesanovic|Zlatan Zuhric-Zuhra
title: Madagascar
